title: Worker Ownership, Readiness, and Knowledge Act
content: Worker Ownership, Readiness, and Knowledge Act or the WORK Act This bill requires the Department of Labor to: (1) establish within the Employment and Training Administration an Employee Ownership and Participation Initiative to promote employee ownership and participation in business decisionmaking. And (2) establish a program that may include grants for outreach, technical assistance, and training to encourage new and existing state programs to foster employee ownership and participation in business decisionmaking.
